languages.text: "Неужели? В таком случае вы без труда ответите, как звали основателя династии".
"Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
languages.original_text: "Неужели? В таком случае вы без труда ответите, как звали основателя династии".

traits.locale_text: "Truly? Well, in that case, it will be no trouble at all for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Truly? Well, in that case, it will be no trouble at all for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, vous ne devriez avoir aucun mal à me donner le nom de son fondateur. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, vous ne devriez avoir aucun mal à me donner le nom de son fondateur. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¿Es eso cierto? En ese caso, no le resultará difícil nombrar al fundador de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es eso cierto? En ese caso, no le resultará difícil nombrar al fundador de la dinastía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “真的是这样吗？既然如此，那您应该很清楚王朝创始人的名字吧？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."

traits.locale_text: “真的是这样吗？既然如此，那您应该很清楚王朝创始人的名字吧？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「そうですか？それなら、王朝の創始者の名前を挙げるのは難しくないはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."

traits.locale_text: 「そうですか？それなら、王朝の創始者の名前を挙げるのは難しくないはずだ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Nun, wenn dem so ist, könnt Ihr mir doch gewiss den Gründer der Dynastie nennen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Nun, wenn dem so ist, könnt Ihr mir doch gewiss den Gründer der Dynastie nennen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle mi? O hâlde hanedanlığın kurucusunun ismini söylemek sizin için zor olmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Indeed? Well, in that case, it should not be difficult for you to name the dynasty's founder."
